attributes.action: Amend the Crime And Disorder Act (1998) and bring back the death penalty for high treason.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: High treason being crime endangering the lives of citizens of the state by an act of terrorism. Parliament changed the law to crime against the state in order to execute king Charles I. Someone who plans to kill people via an act of terrorism should recieve the death penalty. Suicide bombers who survive should recieve the death penalty. The defendant should stand trial before the house of lords and the burden of proof must be proved "beyond all reasonable doubt". A minimum of 2 people have to witness their act of terrorism and stand as witnesses in the trial.
